column5: I am going to get a mistomernier for no insurance on a vechicle will this stop me at the border when I go to canada this summer I have 2 trips planned and if I can prove that I could be turned away at the border for this offence the judge will drop the charge and I will just have to pay the fine KDJ

WC needs a spell check. Do you mean "misdemeanor"? Don't think that will prevent your entry. May slow you down some. Make sure you have current proof of insurance that covers you in Canada and should be fine.
LOL! (His spelling might be a misdemeanor.) Depends on what you did and how long ago.
Ok, gentlemen. Be Nice. Back off. I can't spell worth a spit either. But like KDJ it won't stop me from asking a perfectly honest question from people I respect. Have a nice day. JohnB.O.A.T.
The more he misses the meaner he gets....Missdameaner
I apologize, didn't mean to be too mean spirited. Spelling errors are a pet peeve of mine, my problem not the poster's. I do stand by WC needing a spell check feature though ;-)
Try iespelling, it works on WC and in most other cases. Al
